Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored the opening goal for England
Morten Hjulmand scored a stunning equalizer for Denmark
Phil Foden hit the post with a 20-yard drive
Andreas Christensen half-volleyed over the bar from a corner
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg's effort curled just wide of Jordan Pickford's far post
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate's side were expected to secure their passage to the second round of Euro 2024 with a win against Denmark
England were favored to win based on their pre-tournament bookmakers' favorites tag
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate admitted England need improvement after the draw with Denmark
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg was inches from winning the game for Denmark and thoroughly outplayed the English midfielders
Miscellaneous Highlights: England remain in control of Group C, topping the table on four points with Denmark and Slovenia next with two from two
Denmark had the easiest task to come forward and camp inside England's attacking half due to England's lack of pressure and cohesion between the lines
